description: Morphing blob toast notifications with organic pill-to-blob animations, promise tracking, and full customization.
author: anl331 (https://github.com/anl331)
docs:
## Installation

```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://goey-toast.vercel.app/r/goey-toaster.json
```

## Usage

Add the `<GoeyToaster />` component to your root layout:

```tsx
import { GoeyToaster } from "@/components/ui/goey-toaster"

export default function RootLayout({ children }) {
  return (
    <html>
      <body>
        {children}
        <GoeyToaster />
      </body>
    </html>
  )
}
```

Then trigger toasts anywhere:

```tsx
import { goeyToast } from "@/components/ui/goey-toaster"

goeyToast.success("Saved!")
goeyToast.error("Something went wrong")
goeyToast.promise(fetchData(), {
  loading: "Loading...",
  success: "Done!",
  error: "Failed",
})
```

## Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| position | `top-left` \| `top-right` \| `bottom-left` \| `bottom-right` | `bottom-right` | Toast position |
| duration | `number` | â€” | Default display duration (ms) |
| gap | `number` | `14` | Gap between toasts (px) |
| offset | `number \| string` | `24px` | Distance from edge |
| theme | `light` \| `dark` | `light` | Color theme |

See [full documentation](https://goey-toast.vercel.app) for all options.
